casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
William Zachary HURLEY 1 No. COA16-1202 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: October 17, 2017 1 Although Defendant's birth name is William Zachary Hurley, his adoptive name is William Zachary Burton. We observe that one of the judgments from which Defendant is appealing lists his last name as "Burton."

--------

AFFIRMED IN PART; VACATED IN PART; REMANDED WITH INSTRUCTIONS.
